meanings.definition: Skimmias: a genus of evergreen shrubs native to Asia.
meanings.sent1: The skimmias in the garden have beautiful green leaves.
meanings.sent2: I planted some skimmias in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The skimmias had a party and invited all the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The skimmias stood out among the other shrubs like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the skimmias filled the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: Skimmias: the plural form of skimmia, a type of plant.
meanings.sent1: We saw many skimmias at the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: The skimmias in the pots needed watering.
meanings.sent3: The skimmias decided to have a race to see who was the fastest plant.
meanings.sent4: The skimmias in the garden danced in the wind like graceful ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The bright red berries of the skimmias added a pop of color to the landscape.
